name: Formula One Racer
description:
A low poly formula one racer prototype. Race around 3 circuits against the computer.

Controls

Arrow keys to steer, accelerate, and brake.

Backstory

This was an prototype from early 2020 that just didn't live up to expectations. Technically it has most of the parts a game like this requires however it lacks the fun factor to make you want to play it more than once. I've uploaded this to hopefully get some feedback on what could make it better so please leave a comment below.
